subject: Basketball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The Knicks intend to waive the injured forward Kurt Thomas and sign James Singleton, 31, a 6-foot-8 forward who has been in and out of the N.B.A. since 2005.
snippet: The Knicks intend to waive the injured forward Kurt Thomas and sign James Singleton, 31, a 6-foot-8 forward who has been in and out of the N.B.A. since 2005.
